notes_display: Obv./rev. slightly double strike; blind spot
issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Wahram IV on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap; crown with mural element and two staggered wings; covered korymbos; two ribbons commencing to the left and right below the korymbos, pointing upwards; pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing below ball of hair; pointing upwards; earing consisting of two elements; tunica, neck-line edged with double row of pearls running from shoulder to the breast ornament (only upper part visible); dotted border
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; on the shaft l'st (rāst, "just"); to the left and right of the shaft ribbons pointing downwards, three altar slabs; above bust with diadem and elaborate coiffure to the right, but flames to the left and to the right of the bust, to the left and right of altar attendant with stylized crown of Wahram IV, holding a barsom with both hands, both figures facing inwards; dotted border
